# TaskThreadFunc delegate

```csharp
public delegate void TaskThreadFunc(IntPtr task, IntPtr thread, IntPtr user_data);
```

| --- | --- |

| thread | Transfer ownership: none |
| user_data | Transfer ownership: none; Nullable: true |

Transfer ownership: none
